Class SpreadSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpreadSheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<SpreadSheet.Cell>
    public class SpreadSheet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<SpreadSheet.Cell>
    Basic implementation of a spreadsheet. It contains a set of SpreadSheet.Cells defined by their Positions which can hold various types of elements/values (Element) and comunicate between themselves. It supports the adding and removing of single cells and the removal of entire rows or columns at once. Cells being dependent on are set the value of 0 if targeted for removal, being removed definitely when no longer needed. Cells set the literal value of 0 by the user - or have the value 0 from the result of a function - will NOT be removed, even if the function does not depend on other cells. It is also possible to iterate over every cell in the sheet and see their contents.
    Author:
    Grupo I, Turma A, POO 2018

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public SpreadSheet.Cell get​(java.lang.String _column,
                            int _row)
        Returns the cell at _column, _row location.
        Parameters:
        _column - column of the cell
        _row - row of the cell
        Returns:
        the SpreadSheet.Cell @ _column, _row, or null if the cell does not exist.

      • set

        public boolean set​(java.lang.String _column,
                   int _row,
                   Element _element)
        Sets a new cell at _column, _row location with the specified Element. If the cell does not exist, creates it. Else overwrites that cell content
        Parameters:
        _column - column of the cell
        _row - row of the cell
        _element - Element to add
        Returns:
        always true

      • remove

        public int remove​(java.lang.String _column,
                  int _row)
        Removes the Cell at _column, _row location. If the cell is in use by some other cell it's value is set to 0, until no longer needed or overridden by the user.
        Parameters:
        _column - column of the cell to remove
        _row - row of the cell to remove
        Returns:
        -1 if the cell does not exist, 1 if removed with success, 0 if in use so it's value was set to 0

      • remove

        public int remove​(java.lang.String _column)
        Removes an entire column. All cells in use by other cells are set to 0 as per remove(String, int) and therefore are not considered removed
        Parameters:
        _column - column to remove
        Returns:
        the number of removed cells

      • remove

        public int remove​(int _row)
        Removes an entire row. All cells in use by other cells are set to 0 as per remove(String, int) and therefore are not considered removed
        Parameters:
        _row - row to remove
        Returns:
        the number of removed cells

      • hasCell

        public boolean hasCell​(java.lang.String _column,
                       int _row)
        Checks whether a cell exists
        Parameters:
        _column - column of the cell
        _row - row of the cell
        Returns:
        true if the cell exists, false otherwise

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<SpreadSheet.Cell> iterator()
        Returns an iterator over all the SpreadSheet.Cells of this spreadsheet ordered by the natural order of Position
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<SpreadSheet.Cell>
